testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access detailed information of the user with the
testcase.name: When a GET request containing valid authorization credentials and incorrect customer id data is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/get-user" path parameters..........................passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the incorrect customer 2564 to send to the api get User endpoint..passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api get User endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found..passed
